Name: Tempura
Review Text:
A nice little restaurant. The lady who took our orders seemed strict but was polite. Food was tasty, portions on the smaller side for the price.
We were quite disappointed by the tea.

Name: Tempura
Review Text: BBQ set menu was amazing. Udon tastes good too but sushi is not the best. The lady there was very friendly and nice.

Name: Tempura
Review Text:
Fresh and awesome tasting Japanese food! Huge choice of combo menus and separate menu as well. Some would call it a bit pricey but I think it's worth it!
Hop in even for a little snack, you'd love it as well

Name: Tempura
Review Text: The lady was awesome and the food was nice.

Name: Tempura
Review Text: Amazing place. They have very tasty food and very helpful staff. I would highly recommend this to anyone who love sushi! Take away is very quick, only 5-10 minutes! Retains the taste and still hot! Just as good as eating in!

Name: Tempura
Review Text: The best sushi in Amsterdam. Really nice staff. Great price quality. Give it a try and you won't be disapointed!

Name: Tempura
Review Text: We enjoyed very much our food, the service was very good and polite.

Name: Tempura
Review Text: Never seen such terrible service in my life, the waitress literally ripped the menu out of my hands and started shouting at me. She was completely disrespectful towards all of us and had no clue about how to run a business. DO NOT GO THERE!

Name: Tempura
Review Text: Great sushi in a less touristy location. Been here several times and always have had great fresh sushi

Name: Tempura
Review Text: Unfriendly and chaotic. They can not cope with more than one order. This is more like a friend who tries to cook than a restaurant. Avoid. There are much better options in Amsterdam.

Name: Tempura
Review Text: Great options and tasty food, wait times are short. Menu was a bit wet/sticky, but besides that a great easy dining experience.

Name: Tempura
Review Text: Good sushi place.. super crowded but we found a spot to sit and eat. The quality was great and service more then good. We choose not have set menus but selecting from the menu

Name: Tempura
Review Text: This was the first time my wife and I had tried sushi/sashimi so I honestly cannot tell if it was great, rubbish or indifferent in comparison to other restaurants. …

Name: Tempura
Review Text: Food served quite slow and the Japanese rice was not really Japanese rice.. Not really like sushi in proper Japanese restaurants. Also most menu are salty and not really reasonable amount to price. However I would give the 2 stars for attentive staffs. They are nice.

Name: Tempura
Review Text:
Quick and very tasty as always.
Lovely sushi maki, Best sushi place in Amsterdam! …

Name: Tempura
Review Text: Nothing special but decent enough Japanese fare

Name: Tempura
Review Text: Small but perfectly formed with pavement seating outside very nice too.  Food is excellent and the set menus are very good value.  Good to bring little ones here too.

Name: Tempura
Review Text: The food was delicious .ambiance and the staff extremely friendly.highly recommended.

Name: Tempura
Review Text: Excellent food and friendly staff, I've tried lots of different things and I've been happy every time! Fish is so fresh and soft.

Name: Tempura
Review Text: Horrible... sushi isnt good, the rice is not well cooked, and the inside sushui is poor, not creative. The price dont justify the place and food. Search another japonese restaurant.

Name: Tempura
Review Text: Nice family owned restaurant. Service is friendly if somewhat inconsistent prices are ok for a Japanse restaurant.

Name: Tempura
Review Text: I like Japanese food very much! Especially the sushi here! It's very amazing! I come here for many times!

Name: Tempura
Review Text: Very good food, friendly people. When ordering a menu, this has very balanced contents.

Name: Tempura
Review Text: Worst service ever, but the food is ok.

Name: Tempura

Name: Tempura
Review Text:

Name: Tempura
